DOC.brief_summary: A 3 month, randomized, open label, multi-center study of Technosphere/Insulin compared to insulin aspart in subjects with type 1 diabetes mellitus receiving insulin glargine
DOC.brief_title: A 3 Month, Randomized, Open Label, Multi-center Study of Technosphere/Insulin Compared to Insulin Aspart in Subjects With Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus Receiving Insulin Glargine
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes currently receiving SC insulin at mealtimes for at least 3 months BMI <40 kg/m squared HbA1c greater than or equal to 7% and less than or equal to 11.5% Serum creatinine less than 2 for males and less than 1.8 for females Acceptable pulmonary function Significant hepatic disease Previously diagnosed pulmonary disease, ketoacidosis of evidence of severe secondary complications of diabetes
